content.raw:
I just went through the installation instructions and none of the servers worked, because they required an earlier version of `cloudsim-grant` than the default branch. 

To fix it, I had to remove `node_modules/cloudsim-grant` for each server and rerun `npm install` to get the appropriate version.

I think we should have the default behaviour of the installation instructions be stable, so new users don't have to debug this kind of thing. That could be done by removing the [link](#!/osrf/cloudsim/src/b4c287a4c341972ad3b60646ca4a0f356801e04b/setup.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#setup.bash-15) instruction on setup. We can add instructions to link for development later in the instructions, and let users know that they should keep track of all the versions in this case.
